title: Bactopia Tools
description: Parameters for workflows associated with Bactopia Tools

input_parameters.title: Required Parameters
input_parameters.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

bactopia.description: The path to bactopia results to use as inputs
bactopia.help: The required inputs will be automatically selected by the subworkflow.

filter_parameters.title: Filtering Parameters
filter_parameters.description: Use these parameters to specify which samples to include or exclude.

include.description: A text file containing sample names (one per line) to include from the analysis
include.help: The expected format is a single sample per line.

exclude.description: A text file containing sample names (one per line) to exclude from the analysis
exclude.help: The expected format is a single sample per line.
